cleaned_text: Tuesday, March 02, 2021 [Beaumont's COVID-19 information page](https://www.beaumont.org/coronavirus), the [Michigan Department of Health & Human Services](https://www.michigan.gov/coronavirus)or the [CDC](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html). Three COVID-19 vaccines are available in the United States, and all people age 5 and up are eligible for vaccination. "The best COVID-19 vaccine is the one that is safe and available to you," said Dr. Nick Gilpin, Beaumont's director of infection prevention. "With billions of people in the world, we are going to need multiple vaccines to put an end to this pandemic. Having different options in terms of storage requirements, the number of doses needed and cost is going to help people get vaccinated as quickly and safely as possible.
